title: Add currency selector for cost display
goal: Allow users to switch displayed currency (e.g., USD/EUR) without altering underlying calculations.

context.notes: Formatting-only change; keep domain numbers untouched and derive symbol/label in UI state.

changes.summary: Add a simple currency selector control and adjust cost formatting to show the chosen currency symbol.
acceptanceCriteria: MeetingTimerShell includes a selector to toggle currency option
CostDisplay renders amounts with the selected currency symbol
UI tests cover currency toggling and formatted output

manualChecks: Start the app and confirm switching currency updates displayed symbol without changing numeric totals
